register.description: The FW Region 0 Control Register defines the control fields for the target Isram0.slv region 0 firewall.

bitfield.description: Cache mode for region. Set to 1 to check cache permissions. Set to 0 to ignore cache permissions.
Background enable for region. There can be 1 backgroun region per FW and foreground regions can have overlapping addresses only with the background region.
Lock region. Once set region values cannot be modified.
Enable region. A value of 0xA enables, others disable.

register.description: The FW Region 0 Permission 0 Register defines the permissions for the target Isram0.slv region 0 firewall.
The FW Region 0 Permission 1 Register defines the permissions for the target Isram0.slv region 0 firewall.
The FW Region 0 Permission 2 Register defines the permissions for the target Isram0.slv region 0 firewall.
The FW Region 0 Start Address Low Register defines the start address bits 31 to 0 for the target Isram0.slv region 0 firewall.

bitfield.description: Start address bits 31 to 12. Lowest 12 bits are forced to 0 as address must be 4KB aligned.
Start address bits 11 to 0 are forced to 0 as address must be 4KB aligned.

register.description: The FW Region 0 Start Address High Register defines the start address bits 47 to 32 for the target Isram0.slv region 0 firewall.
The FW Region 0 End Address Low Register defines the end address bits 31 to 0 to include for the target Isram0.slv region 0 firewall.

bitfield.description: End address bits 31 to 12 to include in the match. Lowest 12 bits are forced to 1s as address must be 4KB aligned.
End address bits 11 to 0 are forced to 1s as address must be 4KB aligned minus 1.

register.description: The FW Region 0 End Address High Register defines the end address bits 47 to 32 to include for the target Isram0.slv region 0 firewall.

bitfield.description: End address bits 47 to 32 to include in the match.

register.description: The FW Region 1 End Address High Register defines the end address bits 47 to 32 to include for the target Isram1.slv region 1 firewall.

bitfield.description: End address bits 47 to 32 to include in the match.

register.description: The FW Region 2 Control Register defines the control fields for the target Isram1.slv region 2 firewall.

bitfield.description: Cache mode for region. Set to 1 to check cache permissions. Set to 0 to ignore cache permissions.
Background enable for region. There can be 1 backgroun region per FW and foreground regions can have overlapping addresses only with the background region.
Lock region. Once set region values cannot be modified.
Enable region. A value of 0xA enables, others disable.

register.description: The FW Region 2 Permission 0 Register defines the permissions for the target Isram1.slv region 2 firewall.
The FW Region 2 Permission 1 Register defines the permissions for the target Isram1.slv region 2 firewall.
The FW Region 2 Permission 2 Register defines the permissions for the target Isram1.slv region 2 firewall.
The FW Region 2 Start Address Low Register defines the start address bits 31 to 0 for the target Isram1.slv region 2 firewall.
